errors.email_in_use: E-Mail is already in use by another user
errors.email_not_found: User with this e-mail not found
errors.email_wrong_provider: We found a user with this e-mail, but it is being used with the social login(s)
errors.phone_in_use: Phone number is already in use by another user
errors.phone_not_found: User with this phone number was not found
errors.phone_wrong_provider: We found a user with this phone number, but it is being used with the social login(s)
errors.reset_link_failed: Failed to send reset link. Please try again later.
errors.unknown_auth_error: An unknown error happened with logging in.  Please try again.

phrases.forgot_password_instructions_email: Fill in your e-mail and click the 'Send Magic Link' button. You will receive an auto-login link. Once you are logged in you can go to your profile to change your password.
phrases.forgot_password_instructions_phone: Fill in your phone number and click the 'Send OTP' button. You will receive an passcode via your phone. Once you are logged in you can go to your profile to change your password.
phrases.magic_link_sent_email: Magic link has been sent to your e-mail
phrases.one_time_passcode_sent_phone: One-time passcode has been sent to your phone number
phrases.user_confirmation_instructions: You will need to confirm all communication providers above before you are allowed to log in.

errors.boolean_string: Value must be a string that is either 'true' or 'false'
errors.password_complexity: Password must be at least 16 characters and contain one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one special character, and one number

errors.supabase_connect: Connection to Supabase failed or schema is not valid
